ygData.subject: Re: Tarew's Aquatic Ayre
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Spoil me dammit!! =) I don t mind this spoiler as long as it s not quest-related (?) I don t really like to read spoilers when I m just surfing the net (I
ygData.messageBody:
>From: John Kim <kim@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: eqbards@onelist.com
>Subject: [eqbards] Tarew's Aquatic Ayre
>Date: Fri, 21 May 1999 17:54:31 -0400 (EDT)
>
>You have to go into High Hold itself (another zone in HH
>Pass). Inside in the back are two libraries. One has a man
>selling wizard spells. The other has a man selling bard
>spells (named Justin Rhymes or something, ha ha). There is a
>bank in High Hold, so you don't have to risk any valuable
>equipment and money on the trip over; although the place was
>so camped when I went (the mobs there give no less than three
>highly desired magic items) that I didn't even need
>Accelerando and just walked in. The layout of HH Pass is
>rather confusing, and if you don't mind getting a map online,
>I suggest you do so. There are no 90 degree turns in the
>place, and it's very easy to get disoriented.
>
>--
>John H. Kim
>kim@...
>

Spoil me dammit!! =)
I don't mind this spoiler as long as it's not quest-related (?)
I don't really like to read spoilers when I'm just surfing the net (I try to
avoid them), but I do think asking other players in the game about it is ok
- I see it as part of role-playing.

And yes, Highpass is one of my least favorite zones.

Sartori of Kelethin
